channel.title: List of Lists
channel.description:
Hey guys.
I have a list of lists and am trying to access some values. I am using LinkedLists.
List listOfLists = [ [1,2,3,4], [9, 3, 5, 1], [99, 11, 32, 12] ];
I want to use listOfLists[0] however, an object type is returned rather than a list. How can I convert the object to a list?
All help is appreciated/

item.title: List of Lists
item.dc:creator: @razorback razorback
item.description:
@razorback wrote:

“Linked list implementation of the List interface. Implements all optional list operations, and permits all elements (including null). In addition to implementing the List interface, the LinkedList class provides uniformly named methods to get, remove and insert an element at the beginning and end of the list. These operations allow linked lists to be used as a stack, queue, or double-ended queue (deque).”

I am referring to a LinkedList.

I made an error in my post, the method used to retrieve the item at index 0 is listOfLists.get(0).

listOfLists.get(0) returns [1, 2, 3, 4]. not 1234.

The problem is the type is returned as an object rather than a list. And I need to convert that object into a list so i can access one of the values within the secondary list.

Read full topic

item.title: List of Lists
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

its not called a list first of all lol its called an array, second of all,
listOfLists[0]
will give you the first list 1234
listOfLists[1] will give you 9351
so on and so on

Read full topic
